body: New spell-like abilities are unlocked for you as you rise to ascendency among the drow people.
name: Umbral Scion
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Drow/New Racial Rules/Drow Feats/Umbral Scion

sections.body: Cha 13, Wis 13, Drow Nobility, Greater Drow Nobility, Improved Drow Nobility, able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Select one of the following: dispel magic, divine favor, or suggestion. You may use this spell once per day as a spell-like ability. Your caster level is equal to your character level.
sections.name: Benefit
